subject: Community Giveaway & Proposal for Closer Partnership
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I hope this message finds you well!

As agreed, I’m happy to share that my community has already generated more
than *$1,350 in sales* through my affiliate code and link – which is well
above the 5 confirmed orders we discussed as the requirement for a
community giveaway.

I would therefore love to move forward with the *giveaway of a Simsonn
Pedals Plus X set* during my next Le Mans Ultimate community event on
*September
5–6 (the 6h COTA event)*. This would be a fantastic opportunity to reward
my audience, create excitement around Simsonn, and further establish your
brand here in Germany. Could you please let me know if it’s possible to
arrange the giveaway in time for this event?

In addition, I have already published *two YouTube videos* featuring the
Simsonn Pedals:

   -

   Review :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfFx_shqNUs
   <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXQffPFMOSs&utm_source=chatgpt.com>


   -

   Unboxing: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXQffPFMOSs

At the same time, I believe we now have a great foundation to explore a *closer
partnership*. Some ideas I’d love to discuss include:

   -

   Regular *giveaway collaborations* for future community events.
   -

   Featuring Simsonn as an *official stream sponsor* with logo placement,
   banners, and shoutouts during live streams.
   -

   Potential *early access to new products* for reviews and unboxings,
   which I can then promote directly to my growing community.

The feedback from my viewers has been very positive, and I’m confident that
with a stronger partnership we can significantly increase Simsonn’s
visibility in the German sim racing market.

I’m looking forward to hearing your thoughts and to continuing this
exciting journey together!

Best regards,
Pierre (Chuxl90_)

conversations.body_text: Dear Pierre,  Thank you very much for your message and for the recognition and support you’ve given us. We’re delighted to hear that your community has already generated over $1,350 in sales through your affiliate code — that’s fantastic news and a strong testament to your dedication and influence.  We’re also very excited about your idea to give away a Simsonn Pedals Plus X set during your upcoming Le Mans Ultimate community event on September 5–6. This sounds like a wonderful opportunity to reward your audience and further introduce Simsonn to the German sim racing community. We just need to confirm with you whether you would like us to ship the prize to you in advance, or if you prefer that we ship it directly to the winner after the event.  Thank you as well for creating and sharing your YouTube videos — both the review and the unboxing are excellent and mark an important first step in raising awareness of our products in Germany. We truly appreciate your efforts!  Regarding your ideas for a closer partnership, we’d be more than happy to explore these further with you. We also believe this collaboration has great potential to increase Simsonn’s visibility in Germany, and we look forward to discussing the next steps together.  Once again, thank you for your enthusiasm and support — we’re very glad to be working with you, and we wish your channel continued success!  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Dear Simsonn Team,

I’m very happy to hear your message! Please feel free to send the pedals to
me, and I will take care of everything regarding the giveaway.

Here is my address for shipping:
Pierre Lorenz
Hohe Strasse 12
56244 Hahn am See
Germany

I’m also very excited about exploring a closer partnership with Simsonn. I
believe there’s great potential to further increase Simsonn’s visibility in
Germany, and I would be happy to discuss the next steps and ideas for
collaboration with you.

For any further details, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Best regards,
Pierre

service@simsonn.com

Hello, we are preparing to dispatch a set of Plus X pedals to you, but we need to confirm the pedal model with you. You may take a screenshot from our website and send it to me.  Additionally, we have a good news: you earned a commission of $105.37 last month, which we will transfer to your PayPal account within the next couple of days.

Hello, maybe this set?

[image: image.png]
is this possible?


Greets

Pierre
